reviewText:
REAL HOT SEXY BABIES... HIGHLY RECOMMANDED !!!

1 DVD, MANY HOT CHICKS !

I MEAN "HOT CHICKS" THEY ARE REALLY ALL HOT AND YOUNG !!!)

MORE THAN 15 SCENES WITH DIFFERENT POSTS.

REALLY GOOD DEAL !!!

The ladies in Race Queen 1 seem more comfortable and relaxed than those I saw in Race Queen 2.  Each not only wears a uniform in a inside setting, but a swimsuit OUTSIDE (or in the shower) and a PJ (or nightie) for a bedroom shot.  The models KNOW how to pose and there are lots of nice close-up shots.  All seem to have perfect bodies and they know it.  Also, in this DVD they have 104 minutes for the 16 girls (while in RQ2 they have 25 girls in 85 minutes).  They talk and move about and never seem to freeze up on the viewer and even role play tiny scenes!  One girl talks about cleaning ears with a Q-tip (a Japanese thing).
Add behind the scenes, and virtual features, like virtual wife and virtual Race Queens, and you have the best J-Idols DVD EVER!

... Any who, this DVD has the race girls you have heard about, or not. A bunch of chicks who looks good and just walk around. Once again, your going to want to pickup some music to go with this as it is your basic amateur porn soundtrack. Really [poor] stuff. Get some Nirvana Papa Roach, other than that. it rocks.
